entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 06:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: WNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 9 except minus 5 along the coast.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9 except minus 5 along the coast. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
